comment: This professor was truly so kind. He was so understanding about my missing assignments due to health issues- and he really wants his students to succeed. Best professor I have had so far!

Easy class. He just goes over powerpoints which gets boring but its easy. Three exams for the whole semester without lockdown browser and two, two page papers. Theres also knowledge checks you have to do but they're graded on completion. He only takes attendance if we do a class activity and we didn't do many. He's really nice and its a easy A.

Dr. Tillman is funny and very knowledgeable about US government. His lectures are really helpful and he does extra test reviews that really help to prepare for the tests. His tests are multiple choice and are in person but not difficult at all. He posts a lot of extra resources for you and you never feel lost in his class.

hosts exam reviews (even on weekends), the tests are literally the study guides, and he also hosts in-class exam reviews which is nice. Quizzes were just graded on participation not for accuracy. Very easy class and you can tell he likes what he does.
This class is soooo easy and the professor is chill, honestly harder to fail this class than to pass it. Easy in person test, and assignments online.

Great professor, WANTS YOU TO SUCCEED  provides plenty of materials(lecture notes, focus sheets, review ppts) but his lectures should set you up to do well. Tests are over 5 chapters at a time, mainly vocab, two short answers, prompts given beforehand. Homework is in online textbook but weeks to complete, few participation assignments for grade

prof tillman was an amazing teacher and i would definitely take him again! homework consists of chapter readings but you're given a month to do them and have access to future chapter readings as well if you wanna go further. he gives good lectures and useful notes. all of his exams directly correspond with his notes so its super easy to pass.

took American gov with Professor Tillman, very caring professor I would take him if you can. test are mostly definitional questions and he creates great study guides ands focus sheets and never deviates from the study guide. in person tests, 2 short answer questions given before hand. participation points as well. few assignments very lax grader
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Caring--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Tillman is one of the best professors I've had. He's very caring and offers many extra credit opportunities. If you study the exam study guides a few days before the exam, you'll get a guaranteed A+ on every exam. Attendance isn't mandatory but he does random group activities that are graded. He answers any question and he's very honest.

very understanding professor. attendance is not mandatory, but randomly he will do activities in class that he'll count for a grade but i don't think it'll do much to your grade if you miss. lots of opportunities to do study sessions with him and your peers, a very heavy "i'm gonna read the PowerPoint and talk about it". a little boring but easy A
